verses.name: Ezra 2:26
verses.text: The children of Ramah and Gaba, six hundred twenty and one.

verses.name: Ezra 2:27
verses.text: The men of Michmas, an hundred twenty and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:28
verses.text: The men of Beth–el and Ai, two hundred twenty and three.

verses.name: Ezra 2:29
verses.text: The children of Nebo, fifty and two.

verses.name: Ezra 2:30
verses.text: The children of Magbish, an hundred fifty and six.

verses.name: Ezra 2:31
verses.text: The children of the other Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.

verses.name: Ezra 2:32
verses.text: The children of Harim, three hundred and twenty.

verses.name: Ezra 2:33
verses.text: The children of Lod, Hadid, and Ono, seven hundred twenty and five.

verses.name: Ezra 2:34
verses.text: The children of Jericho, three hundred forty and five.

verses.name: Ezra 2:35
verses.text: The children of Senaah, three thousand and six hundred and thirty.
